name: Aztez
description: Aztez is a highly stylized, brutally satisfying beat 'em up set in the world of the Aztec Empire. Take on the role of an elite close combat unit and undergo missions on behalf of the Empire in the turn-based metagame, and fight against warriors and mythological foes alike using 8 unique weapons in real time combat mode.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ or Newer Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 2000, NVIDIA GeForce 210, or ATI 4850 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better, ATI 7950 or better Additional Notes: Compatible gamepad (i.e. Xbox 360, Xbox One, PS4, etc)
